description: The model will be used for a MBTI test app. The app will provide an immersive Dungeons & Dragons experience when testing the MBTI for the user.
CharacterX requires a model doing role-play. The role it should mimic is Yae Miko from Genshin Impact. The model should be potentially running on user's local device, so it has to be a smaller one.

Introducing the AI Friend app for Loki from Asgard! Dive into the mischievous mind of Loki with personalized chats and unique adventures. Experience the wit, charm, and cunning of the God of Mischief in a whole new interactive way. Join Loki on his legendary escapades today!

Welcome to Hutao's Tavern! Step into the mystical world of Genshin Impact, where the enigmatic and lively Hutao takes center stage. As the spirited 77th Director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor, Hutao is here to captivate you with her charm, wit, and a dash of mischief, just like in the game!
